channel.title: Need Server/Forum coders ASAP!
channel.description:
hey guys, me and a mate of mine want to make a new server we are hiring a server coder and a forums coder.
we are aiming to get the newest server client version out, we will be paying for the vps and all costs and will pay for the coders once it gets up and running, we only want coders that are dedicated to the server and are on atleast 1 hour a day to fix stuff up and help out.
forum coders are pretty the same we will pay you to code the forums, we will pay for all costs and vps hosting, we will get a very good vs after the first month of the server being up once its fully coded and working.
if your interested please post or pm me, if you wanna talk about it 1 on 1 ask me for skype and we can do that. thanks for reading :)

item.title: Need Server/Forum coders ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I’ll be glad to help with Forums and Website developing/coding/management (whatever you’d like to call it). I started learning website design about six years ago (the basics) and i’ve advanced from that time to learn a wide variety of programming languages. Currently I know Html, CSS, Php, MySQL, and can get around and maneuver with Ajax and Javascript (change variables and small parts of code). I’ve owned my own web development business for the past two years and it’s gone pretty successful most recently, hiring nine employees all making a very nice salary, considering the fact that they’re all older than me; makes it pretty funny. If you want some more information or need some help just let me know, setting up the forums takes about 20 minutes, configuring it and customizing it to make it fit your needs and wishes should take about an hour, depending on what is wanted. Then I can help maintain the website and monitor over it while the server is going on, if you want my help just reply here, private message me, or add me on Skype (I’m online right now; online most of the day (other than school time). Skype Username: aj.cordio

Read full topic

item.title: Need Server/Forum coders ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Issaya Issaya
item.description:
@Issaya wrote:

Pm me I’ve been using forums for 5 years, I’m a forum dev and I’m experienced.
I used to ran a successful forum about Occult but due to server cost and everything I closed it.

If you want more info add me on skype aron.bogale13

Read full topic

info? well tbh i want it to be fairly new client and source, we wanna have all chaotics/korasi/sata/vesta/claws/nex armour/dungeneering/skilling and pking/ just the usual game. if u want more information about it add me on skype,

I don’t understand why you need a coder to set up a forum. There’s no/little programming involved anyway. Just common sense.

item.title: Need Server/Forum coders ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

As I’ve said before and I’ll say again, I’ll happily provide forums and websites for private servers for free, as long as they have a paid hosting plan, none of this 000webhost or .tk domain stuff.

Read full topic
